tier.item: A. Malagasy is well-known for having basic VOS word order.

(12) tsy vakin' amboa ny akanga maro
literal meaning: `Many guinea hens aren't caught by a dog'
idiomatic meaning: `There is strength in numbers'
(12) tsy vakin' amboa ny akanga maro
NEG catch.PASS dog the guinea.hen many
literal meaning: `Many guinea hens aren't caught by a dog'
idiomatic meaning: `There is strength in numbers'
tsy vakin' amboa ny akanga maro
NEG catch.PASS dog the guinea.hen many
Many guinea hens aren't caught by a dog
(13) manomboka tsy vakin' amboa ny akanga maro
begin catch.PASS' dog the guinea.hen many
`Many guinea hens are beginning to not be caught by a dog', OR
`There is beginning to be strength in numbers'
